properties.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Modoc County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:41PM PST until January 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...The Warner and Hart Mountains of Lake and Modoc
Counties, and the Winter Rim/Summer Lake area, including Highway
395 near the state line, Highway 140 from Lakeview to Adel, and
Highway 31 between Paisley and Summer Lake.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing and
drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds
could bring down tree branches.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
* Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

* Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and
limited visibilities.

* See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for
latest road conditions.

* A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow
will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY
